title: A Cancer Detection Test Fails in Major Study
summary_full: A closely watched clinical trial in Britain that screened blood for early detection of cancer did not show a reduction in diagnoses at later stages of the disease.
summary_public: A closely watched clinical trial in Britain that screened blood for early detection of cancer did not show a reduction in diagnoses at later stages of the disease.

GB.label: neutral
GB.evidence: A Cancer Detection Test Fails in Major Study
